plot: Victoria Principal stars in three gripping tales of obsessive love, portraying three different women who find there is a price to pay when passion, desire and love are taken to the extreme....
title: Seduction: Three Tales from the 'Inner Sanctum'
plot_es: Victoria Principal stars in three gripping tales of obsessive love, portraying three different women who find there is a price to pay when passion, desire and love are taken to the extreme....
original_name: Seduction: Three Tales from the 'Inner Sanctum'
